description.text: My name is Valentine, I am a front-end developer from Odesa, Ukraine. I like to learn new technologies and improve my skills to create awesome web applications and web pages.

I am looking for a career in an IT company to be part of its team, to work on new, interesting projects and to grow professionally together,am looking for a job in an IT company to be a part of its team, work on new, interesting projects and grow professionally together.
If I were to describe myself in one sentence, it would be a versatile outgoing guy, an admirer of good music and movies, and a technology enthusiast.

skills.heading: Skills
skills.other: HTML, CSS (BEM, RWD), TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, Bulma, EJS, Pug (Jade), SASS/SCSS, PostCSS, React (React Hooks, React Context), Node.js, NPM, Yarn, Webpack, Gulp, Git, Postman, Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Atlassian Jira.

cards.title: Luxury Hotels
cards.text: A four-page hotel landing with scrolling animations, made with Pug, SASS and JS.

cards.title: Mountain
cards.text: Snowboarding and ski school landing page with parallax effect and scroll-triggered animations.

cards.title: Porten
cards.text: A pixel-perfect men's shop landing page with scrolling animations, made with Pug, SASS and JS.

cards.title: Krypto
cards.text: A cryptocurrency page made using React, Axios and CoinGecko API, styled with TailwindCSS.
